text: Allahane nim'ma palige bhumiyannu vasada neleyagisidavanu mattu akasavannu capparavagisidavanu mattu nimage rupavannu nididavanu hagu nim'ma rupavannu andagolisidavanu mattu nirmala vastugala mulaka nimage aharavannu odagisidavanu. Avane nim'ma odeyanada allah. Ella lokagala odeyanada allahanu tumba samrd'dhanu
